page.title: 11HEALTH
page.content: Nearest medical surgeries are at Charing & Ashford,approximately three miles either way.Homeopathy, acupuncture & osteopathy are available.Child clinic held in the village hall in Hothfield.There is an excellent modern hospital named after William Harvey the discoverer of the circulatery system. There is a daily Mini Bus service to take the mentaly handicapped to a training centre in Ashford. Meals-on-wheels are delivered to the neady.Home-helps are provided for those in need. There is a growing interest in both villages for fitness, balanced diets;whole foods that are uncontaminated by drugs,hormones stearoids,colourings,flavourings or any other unnatural additives. There are wonderful people in both villages very helpful in times of crises such as illness or accident.
